summary.text: The development options which can be overridden by "hot-dev" in the "typedoc.json" config file.

An array of npm scripts from you package.json you may want to run.
This is handy for eg. keeping a non blocking sass compiler in watch mode running.

text.comment: An array of npm scripts from you package.json you may want to run. This is handy for eg. keeping a non blocking sass compiler in watch mode running.

summary.text:
The relative path to the directory for compiled code.
Typically

.
If not specified, the default tsc

text.comment: The relative path to the directory for compiled code. Typically ./dist. If not specified, the default tsc outDir will be used.

summary.text:
The relative path to the target project directory from which documentation is to be built.
If this is not specified, it will be the actual theme itself, ie './'

text.comment: The relative path to the target project directory from which documentation is to be built. If this is not specified, it will be the actual theme itself, ie './'
